text: Support engineering units of degrees Celsius temperature

success_criteria.text: Create a Celsius datatype with an initial value of type double
Allow implicit conversion of Celsius datatype to double.
Prevent implicit conversion of a numeric datatype to a Celsius value.
Perform routine math operations on a Celsius datatype.
Increment a value of Celsius by a given amount.
Decrement a value of Celsius by a given amount.
Create a Days datatype with an initial value of type double
Allow implicit conversion of Days datatype to double.
Prevent implicit conversion of a Celsius datatype to a Days value.
Perform routine math operations on a Days datatype.
Increment a value of Days by a given amount.
Decrement a value of Days by a given amount.
